full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DAM CAN RDO RJE LEGS PA'I SGO NAS BZLOG BSGYUR SPU GRI TSIG ZHUNG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005B (CES BSTAN BSRUNG CHEN PO DAM CAN RDO RJE LEGS PA LA BRTEN NAS BZLOG BSGYUR BYED TSUL SPU GRI TSIG ZHUNG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI RNAM DPYOD YANGS PA BRTZON 'GRUS DANG LDAN PA DGE SLONG BLO BZANG LHUN GRUBB BSKUL BA LTAR, SLOB MA THA SHAL BA SKU SKYES SU MA TI AARTHA SIDDHI MING CAN GYIS DAM SNYAM PA'I LHAG BSAM DAG PA'I SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI BGYIS PA'O, ,BKRA SHIS 'BAR GYUR CIG , ,,DGE'O, ,)
